channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [AMQ-9740] "org.apache.commons.lang3.StringEscapeUtils cannot be resolved to a type" errors on Web Console
item.description:
Some pages in the Web Console (for example, Send, Queue Details) fail to load. ActiveMq logs show:

2025-07-03 19:43:34,007 | WARN  | /admin/send.jsp | org.eclipse.jetty.server.HttpChannel | qtp1910813448-74
jakarta.servlet.ServletException: jakarta.servlet.ServletException: org.apache.jasper.JasperException: Unable to compile class for JSP:An error occurred at line: [27] in the jsp file: [/WEB-INF/tags/form/text.tag]
org.apache.commons.lang3.StringEscapeUtils cannot be resolved to a type
24:     if (value == null) {
25:         value = "";
26:     }
27:     value = org.apache.commons.lang3.StringEscapeUtils.escapeHtml4(value);
28:
29: %>
30: <input type="text" name="${name}" value="<%= value %>"/>
Stacktrace:

28:

item.summary: "org.apache.commons.lang3.StringEscapeUtils cannot be resolved to a type" errors on Web Console

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Commit 8a8dc91e6b84390c626d772ad0e5f0d937a4b654 in activemq's branch refs/heads/main from Sergio Lemos
[ https://gitbox.apache.org/repos/asf?p=activemq.git;h=8a8dc91e6b ]

AMQ-9740: Web Console's form:short and form:text tags do not use commons-lang3 to sanitize inputs.

Adjusts the Web Console after the project dependency on commons-lang3 was removed.

Commit 307c0293856c00cf430804a26840dc962c3ab26e in activemq's branch refs/heads/main from Matt Pavlovich
[ https://gitbox.apache.org/repos/asf?p=activemq.git;h=307c029385 ]

Merge pull request #1469 from sergio-d-lemos/AMQ-9740

AMQ-9740: Fixes "org.apache.commons.lang3.StringEscapeUtils cannot be resolved to a type" in the Web Console.
